intro: Every broken house deserves a second chance – build your dream home.
description:
House Renovator Simulator offers a realistic renovation experience where you transform old houses into modern, welcoming homes. From tearing down walls to customizing interiors with furniture and finishes, every detail counts.

With a wide range of tools and materials, you have full control to create spaces in modern, rustic, or classic styles. Realistic mechanics and endless customization let you bring forgotten homes back to life using your skill and creativity.

Key features:
	•	Complete renovation experience from demolition to final decoration.
	•	A wide variety of high-quality tools and materials for customization and upgrades.
	•	Realistic mechanics for painting, flooring, plumbing, and electrical work.
	•	Efficient management of budget, time, and resources for successful projects.

Every house has a story, and you are the one who can rewrite it. Embark on this journey and turn forgotten spaces into dream homes with House Renovator Simulator!
